mapper.select: SELECT a.emp_acct_id, a.vend_id, a.emp_id, a.login_id, a.login_pwd, a.st, a.fail_cnt, a.lock_dttm, a.last_login, a.yn, a.crea_dt, a.crea_by, a.updt_dt, a.updt_by, a.temp_yn, a.mas_yn, e.nm AS empNm, e.dept_id AS deptId, d.dept_nm AS deptNm, v.bizcnd, v.addr, e.cttpc, v.hp, e.email, e.proof_photo FROM TB_EMP_ACCT a LEFT JOIN TB_EMP e ON a.EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID AND a.VEND_ID = e.VEND_ID LEFT JOIN TB_DEPT d ON e.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID AND e.VEND_ID = d.VEND_ID LEFT JOIN TB_VEND v ON a.VEND_ID = v.VEND_ID WHERE a.VEND_ID = #{vendId} AND a.LOGIN_ID = #{loginId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_emp_acct SET fail_cnt = fail_cnt + 1, st = CASE WHEN fail_cnt + 1 >= #{maxFailCnt} THEN 'r2' ELSE st END, lock_dttm = CASE WHEN fail_cnt + 1 >= #{maxFailCnt} THEN SYSDATE ELSE lock_dttm END, updt_dt = SYSDATE, updt_by = #{updtBy} WHERE emp_acct_id = #{empAcctId}
UPDATE tb_emp_acct SET st = 'r1', fail_cnt = 0, lock_dttm = NULL, updt_dt = SYSDATE, updt_by = #{updtBy} WHERE emp_acct_id = #{empAcctId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.auth_code FROM tb_auth a JOIN tb_user_role ur ON a.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.emp_acct_id = #{empAcctId}

SELECT a.emp_acct_id, a.vend_id, a.emp_id, a.login_id, a.login_pwd, a.st, a.fail_cnt, a.lock_dttm, a.last_login, a.yn, a.crea_dt, a.crea_by, a.updt_dt, a.updt_by, a.temp_yn, a.mas_yn, e.nm AS empNm, e.dept_id AS deptId, d.dept_nm AS deptNm, v.bizcnd, v.addr, e.cttpc, v.hp, e.email, e.proof_photo FROM TB_EMP_ACCT a LEFT JOIN TB_EMP e ON a.EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID AND a.VEND_ID = e.VEND_ID LEFT JOIN TB_DEPT d ON e.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID AND e.VEND_ID = d.VEND_ID LEFT JOIN TB_VEND v ON a.VEND_ID = v.VEND_ID WHERE a.EMP_ACCT_ID = #{empAcctId}
